item.dragonscales_armor.desc: 增強對龍息攻擊的防護力
item.iceandfire.air_pods.desc: 天啊!Steve帶著AirPods，他聽不到我們的聲音!
item.iceandfire.stymphalian_arrow.desc: 金屬怪鳥箭矢能像鳥一樣的翱翔
item.iceandfire.amphithere_arrow.desc: 用翼蛇翅膀的力量擊退所有怪物!
item.iceandfire.sea_serpent_armor.desc_1: 碰到水的時候會有力量加成，穿上全套裝備時提升力量等級
item.iceandfire.chain.desc_0: 就像是栓繩，可以綁在牆上
item.iceandfire.chain.desc_1: 不會被拉壞，可以用在大多數的生物身上
item.iceandfire.chain_sticky.desc_2: 可以將兩隻生物連接在一起
item.iceandfire.deathworm_gauntlet.desc_: 用舌頭攻擊目標，會造成3點傷害
item.iceandfire.pixie_wand.desc_0: 發射可造成5點傷害並讓目標浮空的魔法彈
item.iceandfire.myrmex_swarm.desc_0: 召喚5隻巨蟻為你作戰，會在30秒內保護你
item.iceandfire.hippogryph_sword.desc_0: Always slashes target, dealing extra damage
item.iceandfire.hippogryph_sword.desc_1: Every use of it is a sweeping attack
item.iceandfire.cyclops_eye.desc_1: 持有時會對附近所有怪物產生虛弱效果
item.iceandfire.cockatrice_scepter.desc_: 其他靠近十字準星的目標也會受到攻擊
item.iceandfire.siren_flute.desc_1: 此時的怪物無法進行攻擊
item.iceandfire.hippocampus_slapper.desc: Dazes and slows targets; it's quite confusing to be hit with a fish tail
item.iceandfire.stymphalian_feather_bund: 向以使用者為中心的八個方向發射鋒利的羽毛
item.iceandfire.amphithere_macuahuitl.de: 把實體打到空中在掉下來
item.iceandfire.hydra_heart.desc_0: When in hotbar, gives increasing regeneration
item.iceandfire.hydra_heart.desc_1: based on how inju red the holder is
item.iceandfire.hydra_arrow.desc: 對目標下毒並吸取生命值
item.iceandfire.summoning_crystal.desc_1: 綁定後點擊右鍵即可召喚你的龍
item.iceandfire.ghost_sword.desc_0: 射出一把能穿過方塊的旋轉劍
item.iceandfire.ghost_sword.desc_1: 劍形投射物可以造成額外傷害
dragon.name: 名稱:

myrmex.message.cant_use_staff: §cYou can no longer use a Myrmex Staff on this colony.
myrmex.message.null_hive: This Rouge Myrmex does not have a hive!

myrmex.message.staff_already_set: §cThis staff is already set to this colony!
myrmex.message.staff_not_set: §cThis staff is not set to any Myrmex Colony.

amphithere.command.new_home: 這隻翼蛇的家已設定為%d, %d, %d。
myrmextools.hurt: 對非截肢生物和沙蟲的傷害+4
myrmextools.poison: 給予目標10秒的中毒效果
message.iceandfire.dragonTeleport: 這隻龍已被召喚到你身邊。
message.iceandfire.noDragonTeleport: §c找不到跟這塊水晶綁定的龍
death.attack.gorgon.1: %s被蛇髮女妖變成戈貢佐拉起司
tc.aspect.mythus: Mythological Creature, Legendary Being, Cryptid, Fearsome Critter
advancements.iceandfire.root.title: 冰與火
advancements.iceandfire.bestiary.title: 魔物之書
advancements.iceandfire.bestiary.descrip: 使用在地下城中找到的三張手稿製作一本傳說生物預言集
advancements.iceandfire.lectern.title: 想知道更多嗎?
advancements.iceandfire.lectern.descript: 製作書桌，進一步了解冰與火的世界
advancements.iceandfire.dragon_egg.title: 龍之母
advancements.iceandfire.dragon_stick.des: 製作一支馴龍杖來控制你的龍
advancements.iceandfire.dragon_flute.des: 製作龍骨笛，叫回失控的龍
advancements.iceandfire.dragon_horn.desc: 製作龍之號角來收起你的龍
advancements.iceandfire.dragon_meal.desc: 製作龍飼料，讓龍寶寶快速成長
advancements.iceandfire.dragonbone_sword: 打造傳說中的火、冰龍或電龍武器
advancements.iceandfire.dragonsteel.desc: 用龍血和鐵錠製造龍鋼錠
在鷹馬附近丟兔子腳，馴服牠
advancements.iceandfire.gorgon_head.desc: 獲得蛇髮女妖的頭顱，這是一種能將任何生物都變成石頭的武器
advancements.iceandfire.tame_pixie.title: Here Comes Your Man
advancements.iceandfire.tame_pixie.descr: 在小精靈附近丟蛋糕，跟他交朋友
advancements.iceandfire.jar_pixie.title: Surfer Rosa
advancements.iceandfire.jar_pixie.descri: 把小精靈關進瓶子裡，讓他們製造精靈塵
advancements.iceandfire.pixie_wand.title: Where Is My Mind?
advancements.iceandfire.rotten_egg.title: 真是爛透了
丟雞蛋直到丟出小雞蛇獸，或是盯著雞蛇獸直到馴服牠
advancements.iceandfire.kill_siren.title: 把我綁在桅杆上!
advancements.iceandfire.kill_siren.descr: 抵擋賽壬的歌聲並將其擊殺
advancements.iceandfire.tame_hippocampus: 用海帶餵海洋馬，馴服牠
advancements.iceandfire.kill_deathworm.d: 殺死沙蟲。專家提示:牠們喜歡吃TNT!
advancements.iceandfire.stymphalian_arro: 製作能飛得更遠的金屬怪鳥箭矢
advancements.iceandfire.kill_troll.title: 他們帶來了一隻山怪!
advancements.iceandfire.kill_myrmex.desc: 殺死巨蟻並從牠身上取得巨蟻甲殼
advancements.iceandfire.myrmex_resin.tit: 這就像是在自己印鈔票!
擊落翼蛇，並騎到牠身上，馴服牠
advancements.iceandfire.tide_trident.des: 項生物投擲潮汐三叉戟
advancements.iceandfire.kill_hydra.title: 海利克斯的十二項任務
advancements.iceandfire.kill_ghost.title: 你想打給誰?
item.iceandfire.fire_dragon_blood.jei_de: 手持玻璃瓶對火龍的屍體點擊右鍵即可獲得
item.iceandfire.ice_dragon_blood.jei_des: 手持玻璃瓶對冰龍的屍體點擊右鍵即可獲得
item.iceandfire.lightning_dragon_blood.j: 手持玻璃瓶對電龍的屍體點擊右鍵即可獲得
item.iceandfire.dragon_skull_fire.jei_de: 可以放在地上或牆上當戰利品
item.iceandfire.dragon_skull_ice.jei_des: 可以放在地上或牆上當戰利品
item.iceandfire.dragon_skull_lightning.j: 可以放在地上或牆上當戰利品

item.iceandfire.cyclops_skull.jei_desc: 可以放在地上或牆上當戰利品
item.iceandfire.cockatrice_skull.jei_des: 可以放在地上或牆上當戰利品
item.iceandfire.stymphalian_skull.jei_de: 可以放在地上或牆上當戰利品
item.iceandfire.troll_skull.jei_desc: 可以放在地上或牆上當戰利品
item.iceandfire.amphithere_skull.jei_des: 可以放在地上或牆上當戰利品
item.iceandfire.seaserpent_skull.jei_des: 可以放在地上或牆上當戰利品
item.iceandfire.hydra_skull.jei_desc: 可以放在地上或牆上當戰利品
item.iceandfire.fire_stew.jei_desc: 可以讓兩隻一公一母的龍繁殖。母龍會建造一個巢，然後在裡面下蛋
item.iceandfire.frost_stew.jei_desc: 可以讓兩隻一公一母的龍繁殖。母龍會建造一個巢，然後在裡面下蛋
item.iceandfire.lightning_stew.jei_desc: 可以讓兩隻一公一母的龍繁殖。母龍會建造一個巢，然後在裡面下蛋
modifier.splintering2.desc: 留個紀念給你的敵人!§r\n攻擊越多次，傷害越高
modifier.fractured2.desc: 痛!§r\n你的工具的傷害增加了
modifier.splitting2.desc: 一分為三!§r\射出箭矢時的瞬間加速可能導致它分裂成三支箭矢
modifier.hive_defender.desc: For Queen and Colony!§r\nDeals +8 extra damage against death worms and +4 damage against non-arthropods.
modifier.flame2.desc: Burn baby burn!§r\nSets enemies on fire for 15 seconds with added knockbacks, and deals additional dragon flame damage.
modifier.frost2.desc: Ice-ice baby!§r\nFreezes enemies in a block of ice for 15 seconds with added knockback, and deals additional dragon frost damage.
modifier.flame.desc: Burn baby burn!§r\nSets enemies on fire for 10 seconds, and deals additional dragon flame damage.
modifier.frost.desc: Ice-ice baby!§r\nFreezes enemies in a block of ice for 10 seconds, and deals additional dragon frost damage.
modifier.antigravity.desc: Onwards!§r\nThe arrow will maintain its height and will not be effected by gravity for the duration of the flight. Where you aim, it flies.
modifier.arrow_knockback.desc: Up and At 'Um!§r\nThe arrow will inflict strong knockback when it hits an entity.
modifier.sweater_song.desc: "If you want to destroy my sweater..."§r\nTargets wearing armor have a 30% chance of their armor being removed from a critical strike.
modifier.surf_wax_america.desc: "You take your car to work, I'll take my board...:"§r\nDeals an additional 5 damage when players are riding a mount.
modifier.in_the_garage.desc: "In the garage where I belong..."§r\nDeals an additional 5 damage when player is not in direct sunlight.
